title: Amazon is seeing some employees quit instead of moving to a new state as part of relocation mandate
description: As Amazon tries to get employees back to the office, some staffers are being told to relocate to hubs in different states if they want to keep their jobs

title: Tesla engineering executive Colin Campbell joins Redwood Materials as technology chief
description: More than 120 people who previously worked at Tesla now work for JB Straubel's recycling venture, Redwood Materials, according to LinkedIn data.

title: This town is relocating to higher ground due to sea-level rise. Here's what that entails
description: The Quinault Indian Nation has experienced severe flooding due to sea-level rise and is now looking to relocate an entire town to higher ground.

title: UPS workers approve massive new labor deal with big raises
description: The agreement is the largest collective bargaining agreement at a private-sector employer based on number of workers.

title: Even millionaires are feeling financially insecure, report finds
description: These days, only 12% of Americans consider themselves wealthy, including just 29% of millionaires. Some go so far as to say they’re poor.

title: Workers overwhelmingly want a 4-day workweek—on one condition
description: Support for a condensed workweek may come on one condition.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried isn't getting his Adderall and is surviving on 'bread and water,' lawyers say
description: Following a superseding indictment of Sam Bankman-Fried, lawyers for the FTX founder expressed concerns about his living conditions in jail.

title: Amazon AI scammers blew millions on Lake Como wedding and cars, FTC alleges
description: The FTC unveiled a complaint against John and Roman Cresto, alleging the brothers made tens of millions through an Amazon and Walmart storefront scheme.

title: AMC shares crater as investors brace for stock conversion
description: The movie theater chain's preferred equity units, dubbed APE shares, are set to be transformed into common stock.

title: JPMorgan executive explains why decarbonization is a megatrend that business can't ignore
description: Rama Variankaval is a top climate dealmaker at JPMorgan Chase. He talks to CNBC about how and why decarbonization became what he calls a megatrend.

title: This startup is helping the ocean absorb more harmful carbon emissions
Dick's shares fall 24% as retailer slashes outlook over theft concerns
description: Dick's Sporting Goods says it's grappling with an uptick in retail theft that contributed to a 23% drop in profits, prompting it to slash its full year outlook.

title: Novavax shares surge after drugmaker says new Covid vaccine was effective against Eris variant
description: Novavax's vaccine and new shots from Pfizer and Moderna are expected to roll out in the U.S. within weeks, pending potential approvals from the FDA.

title: Meta's Threads begins rolling out on the web, as Zuckerberg takes more direct aim at Elon Musk's X
description: Meta's Twitter clone called Threads is now available on the web for people to access via their desktop computers.

title: Coinbase takes stake in stablecoin firm Circle, shuts down joint venture as it sees 'regulatory clarity'
description: Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase is taking a stake in Circle, the issuer of the USDC stablecoin.

title: Russia, expansion and Western relations in the spotlight as leaders gather for pivotal BRICS summit
description: Leaders from five developing nations accounting for nearly half the world's population are gathering in Johannesburg on Tuesday for the 15th BRICS Summit.

title: U.S. Commerce Secretary set to visit China next week as high-level talks continue
description: U.S. Secretary of Commerce Gina Raimondo is set to visit China from Aug. 27 to 30, both countries announced Tuesday.

title: Srettha Thavisin elected Thailand's new prime minister after parliamentary vote
description: Thailand has been administered by a caretaker government since March, with its parliament in deadlock.

title: China's Baidu reports 15% revenue growth, beating expectations
description: Chinese tech company Baidu reported better-than-expected revenue, up by 15% year-on-year in the second quarter.

title: Microsoft submits new Activision Blizzard takeover deal to British regulator after initial block
description: Microsoft on Tuesday submitted a new deal to U.K. regulators for the takeover of Activision Blizzard after the rejection of its initial proposal.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Rising yields couldn’t stifle excitement over Nvidia
description: Despite rising yields, tech rallied. Investors are anticipating Nvidia’s earnings report — if it meets its revenue forecast, expect its stock to surge.

title: Is nuclear energy the answer to a sustainable future? Experts are divided
description: One analyst is of the view that only nuclear power can deliver cost effective, reliable, and clean energy, solving the problem of reliability

title: Rice prices soar, fanning fears of food inflation spike in Asia
description: A confluence of factors is stoking fears that shortage of rice supplies could mark a return to a broad increase in the prices of other food commodities in Asia.

title: Global onion prices could be set to rise with India slapping an export tax on domestic production
description: India has slapped a 40% export tax on onions on the back of higher domestic prices of the vegetable.
